1.title: Pchelka
1.plot: 1 The kid brings home a bee - he is going to train her and teach him how to carry out the simplest commands. But the bee does not give in to training, the insect runs away and arranges a stir among the household .

2.title: Opyat' dvoyka
2.plot: The friend unsuccessfully tries to deduce from a diary the deuce. The situation is complicated by Lisa, who at all costs, wants to take the diary and show it to her parents .

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: Gen needed player Druzhka for the most important scientific experiment. But the brother does not want to give it away - after the genius experiments, household appliances, as a rule, go out of order. Then Gena decides to persuade the Druzhka that he came into contact with aliens,

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot: The druzhka was left to sit with the Kid - just on the evening when the finals of the World Cup are broadcast.

5.title: Episode #1.5
5.plot: Gene and Druzhok bring home an old safe. Stuck in the household is necessary - because it is fireproof, impenetrable and unsinkable. However, these qualities turn out to be a big problem when the Kid is accidentally locked in a safe .

6.title: Episode #1.6
6.plot: Rose is touched by the ideal life shown in her favorite TV series. She decides to change and her world for the better - and to start re-educating her twin brother Druzhka. After all, if in the world it becomes one lesser, it will become a little better .

7.title: Episode #1.7
7.plot: Children decide to join forces to participate in the TV contest for the best music video. But one desire is not enough - because you still need to decide who will provide technical support, and who will be in the frame ..

8.title: Episode #1.8
8.plot: Barboskiny - 8 series 12/12/2017 Gena discovers the mathematical ability of the baby and loads him with studies - he must help his brother develop his talent. But the Kid is too zealous in acquiring knowledge and very quickly turns into a boring bore, who are not interested in toys. In the changed Baby Genka recognizes himself.

9.title: Episode #1.9
9.plot: Liza is confident that her vocal data will ensure her the chic future of a popular singer. But over the voice it is necessary to work - that Lisa with pleasure and does, singing for days on end. The rest of the children do not share the sister's enthusiasm for her abilities,

10.title: Episode #1.10
10.plot: A friend with Lisa is arguing which of them will better put the Toddler to sleep. Fascinated by clarifying the relationship, they almost forget about the Baby .

11.title: Episode #1.11
11.plot: Lisa and Rosa decide that for their new invention, Gena will certainly receive the Nobel Prize. They do not understand much about what he is working on, but they are sure that having received the award, he will give his beloved sister a house with a swimming pool. Which of the beloved sisters is now to be found out.

12.title: Episode #1.12
12.plot: Sisters Lisa and Rose again quarrel over trifles. The kid is looking for a way to reconcile them - but it only gets worse - Kid remembers that in moments of danger, everyone forgets about quarrels. And he decides on a desperate step - arranges a flood at home.

13.title: Episode #1.13
13.plot: Barboskiny - 13 series Plans Druzhka violated - the common cold. The rest of the children decide to help their brother and do all the work for him. My friend, being sure that without him this world will stop, suddenly realizes that all his affairs are quietly performed by others. The friend falls into despair.

14.title: Episode #1.14
14.plot: Barboskiny - 14 series Druzhok dreams of a new computer game in which his favorite character Hound Dog must win the final victory over his worst enemy - Professor Zlaykin. But to get the game you need to collect five gift tokens. Collecting the necessary number, Druzhok goes to all sorts of tricks to lure tokens from sisters and brothers. The friend does not notice that every such act makes him more and more like the unloved Zlaykin.

15.title: Episode #1.15
15.plot: Barboskiny - 15 SERIES Rosa dreams about how her appearance will ensure her future career as a film actress. Her dreams are so seductive that Lisa also wants to become a film star. Between the sisters there is a dispute, who is more worthy of a movie screen.

1.title: Episode #2.1
1.plot: Barboskiny - 16 series 12/12/2017 The kid dumps the blame for all his tricks on his favorite toy - Bunny. The children decide to treat the child's invention "pedagogically" and resolve the situation without resorting to punishment. But the "Bunny" is more and more mischievous.

3.title: Episode #2.3
3.plot: Barboskiny - 18 series 12/12/2017 The ridiculous SMS-voting on TV (which is better - cosmetics or video games?) Leads to a serious conflict between Rosa and Druzhk and overdelivery of the balance on the daddy mobile phone.

4.title: Episode #2.4
4.plot: Barboskiny - 19 series 12/12/2017 Lisa does not let Rosa calmly talk on the phone - the Druzhka loudly scolds for all sorts of faults. Rosa sets the condition - if Lisa will behave quietly for at least an hour, she will get delicious sweets. The friend offers Lisa to share - for this he will leave her alone for an hour. But Lisa does not agree, and Druzhok suits her a real test.

5.title: Episode #2.5
5.plot: Barboskiny - 20 series 12/12/2017 Rose is not satisfied with the gifts that other children have prepared for her on her birthday. She gives them a list of the things she needs, which children must get for the rest of the day before the holiday. To her amazement at the festive dinner, no one comes.

6.title: Episode #2.6
6.plot: Barboskiny - 21 series 12/12/2017 Lisa, wishing to prove to her friend that she had mastered the skills of hypnosis, introduces him into a trance and inspires his brother that he is a chicken. The friend cackles clumsily, but he can not get out of this state.

7.title: Episode #2.7
7.plot: Barboskiny - 22 series 12/12/2017 Gene has grown a new kind of plant with amazingly delicious berries. So delicious that Druzhok, unable to resist, secretly eats them one by one. One hope is that Gene will not guess who took his experiment. But Gena says that the new fruits have one side effect: the one who eats it becomes red. Now the Druzhka has only one way out: to make the EVERYTHING red in the evening.

8.title: Episode #2.8
8.plot: Barboskiny - 23 series 12/12/2017 Amusement park "Luntland" announces a competition of children's drawings - the winner receives a free ticket for all attractions. Young Barboskins take pencils and markers, turning from friendly sisters and brothers into uncompromising competitors. The kid does not like this state of affairs, he wants everyone to win.

9.title: Episode #2.9
9.plot: Barboskiny - 24 series 12/12/2017 Lisa learns about the amazing "candy of truth" - who will eat at least one, can not lie. Now her task is to feed the Boyfriend with such a candy that he confesses that it is he who has eaten the cookies.

10.title: Episode #2.10
10.plot: Barboskiny - 25 series 12/12/2017 Children remain alone in the evening, the TV is at their disposal. But what to watch, because everyone has his own tastes? Peacefully solve the problem can not, and the guys decide to arrange a competition - who will first take over the console, then let him turn on his favorite channel.

11.title: Episode #2.11
11.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

12.title: Episode #2.12
12.plot: Barboskiny - 26 series 12/12/2017 For the time of repair, Genova is moved into the Druzhka room. All would be nothing, if you did not have to endure at night his snoring. The friend is looking for a way how to cope with this misfortune.

13.title: Episode #2.13
13.plot: Barboskiny - 27 series 12/12/2017 Lisa worries because she is the only redhead in the family. It comes to a sit-in strike and the announcement of a boycott to all "non-coherent". Now the rest of the family need to figure out how to convince Lisa that being red is not at all scary.

14.title: Episode #2.14
14.plot: Barboskiny - 28 series 12/12/2017 Lisa discovers a rare football card from the Little Boy, which Druzhok really wants to buy for his collection. Lisa realizes that for the sake of this card, Druzhok will do anything for her. It remains only to exchange something for this card from the Baby.

15.title: Episode #2.15
15.plot: Barboskiny - 29 series 12/12/2017 Rosa wants to go on a diet, but she lacks willpower. The rest of the family decide to support the little sister - together and starving is easier. But in reality everything is not as easy as expected. And now everyone is ready to break the collective agreement and sneak into the refrigerator.

1.title: Episode #3.1
1.plot: Barboskiny - 30 series 12/12/2017 Lisa read in the newspaper about how a fraudster brother slipped a casket of soporous gas into his sister. Impressed with such perfidy, she suddenly notices that Gena behaves extremely suspiciously - and most importantly, he always sits over some box.

2.title: Episode #3.2
2.plot: Barboskiny - 31 series 12/13/2012 Lisa dreams of summoning the genie to do all the work for her. A friend decides to take advantage of the situation and play a sister - under the guise of a deputy genie, he declares that the right to personal desires must be earned. And makes Lisa perform a bunch of ridiculous tasks.

3.title: Episode #3.3
3.plot: Barboskiny - 32 series 12/13/2012 Liza dreams of becoming the understudy of her adorable singer Jeanne Pussy. But the trouble is - there is not enough growth. Druzhok and Gena are ready to help her sister solve her problem in the shortest possible time.

4.title: Episode #3.4
4.plot: Barboskiny - 33 series 12/13/2012 My friend really wants to get a new heaped lyfon - a dream for any child. And now Lisa wins this phone in a talent contest. She is ready to exchange her lybofon for the dearest that the Druzhka has - the T-shirt of the legendary football player Arshavkin, whom he personally gave him at one of the matches - When Druzhok still decides to exchange, it turns out that this model of the phone is already out of date - new.

5.title: Episode #3.5
5.plot: Barboskiny - 34 series 12/13/2012 Rose is tired of living in the same room with Lisa - she is already an adult and believes that she deserves a separate room. But for the Kid, your room is an inadmissible luxury. Rosa decides that the Kid can fully live and with Liza. Now it remains only to convince the Little One of this. And Rosa tells him a terrible "secret" - in his room there is a very harmful ghost. But Kid does not intend to give up his territory without a fight - he decides to challenge the ghost.

6.title: Episode #3.6
6.plot: Barboskiny - 35 series 12/13/2012 Children eat too much candy. To disaccustom the children from a bad habit, the Pope forbids them at all to eat sweets for two weeks. Lisa agrees that the punishment is fair, and promises to personally monitor compliance with the ban. Soon, Lisa finds a candy, with which she finds the Pope. Papa is very upset - he did not expect Lisa to break the promise first. Now, in order to restore her honest name, Liza needs to investigate and find out who actually owns the candy.

7.title: Episode #3.7
7.plot: Barboskiny - 36 series 12/13/2012 The friend had some secret - he hides in his room a bright box. Rosa and Lisa are intrigued, they are trying at all costs to entice Druzhka and look into the treasured box.

8.title: Episode #3.8
8.plot: Barboskiny - 37 series 12/13/2012 The friend always dreams the same nightmare - as he is abducted by aliens. He asks Genka to help him not to sleep at all, so as not to see the end of a terrible dream.

9.title: Episode #3.9
9.plot: Barboskiny - 38 series 12/13/2012 Baby wants his Dad to become a superman - you just need to pump up muscles and learn how to fly. By happy coincidence the small fish in the Aquarium of the Baby turns out to be magic and fulfills its desire. The pope acquires a superpower, but now he spends too much time fighting the world's evil - and he forgets about games with the Kid. Fortunately, it turns out to be just a dream. When the Kid wakes up, the fish remains an ordinary fish, and the Pope is an ordinary dad. But will the Kid now want to have superpower?

10.title: Episode #3.10
10.plot: Barboskiny - 39 series 12/13/2012 Lisa and Baby are watching a horrible movie about aliens who are changing ordinary people to evil copies. The friend decides to scare the kids and pretends that he is one of the evil clones. The rally succeeds to the glory - when the Friend wakes up, he discovers that he is connected. Now he has to prove to Liza and Kid that he is not a clone, but a real Druzhok.

11.title: Episode #3.11
11.plot: Barboskiny - 40 series 12/13/2012 Children are breaking a new dad's laptop. Now Saturday's march to the theater, which everyone was waiting for, is under big question. From the minute to the minute, Dad will return from work and discover a breakdown.

13.title: Episode #3.13
13.plot: Barboskiny - 42 series 12/13/2012 Rosa dreams of becoming a pop singer - with such an effective appearance it's not a problem. Hearing and voices, the truth is not, but it does not matter - Gena will draw a voice on the computer. Liza does not like such a deception, she decides to bring the false singer to clean water.

14.title: Episode #3.14
14.plot: Barboskiny - 43 series 12/13/2012 The friend declares, that everyone the present boy necessarily for something, yes will punish. Genka clearly does not fall under these standards - his parents never punished him for perfect behavior - to prove to Druzhka that he is "a real guy", Genka decides to commit a bad deed and receive a well-deserved punishment.

15.title: Episode #3.15
15.plot: Barboskiny - 44 series 12/13/2012 The friend sees a prophetic dream about winning the lottery, Lisa gives money from her piggy bank, and Rosa buys a ticket - A winning ticket. But how to divide the winnings? Everyone thinks that his contribution is more weighty, and hence the ticket is his.

1.title: Episode #4.1
1.plot: Barboskiny - 45 series 12/13/2012 The friend adores his children's typewriter, but is embarrassed by this hobby - he even plays it secretly. Behind this "shameful" occupation he is caught by the Kid. The friend is justified - yes, I do not play at all, I just wanted to throw away the old trash. But now the Kid wants to take the toy to himself. My friend has to invent new reasons not to give his favorite car.

2.title: Episode #4.2
2.plot: Barboskiny - 46 series 12/13/2012 The kid secretly brings home a frog. Rosa and Lisa take her for an enchanted prince. The girls are sure that the prince will immediately fall in love with the one who rips his kiss.

3.title: Episode #4.3
3.plot: Barboskiny - 47 series 12/13/2012 A friend wins a radio-controlled airplane on the city relay race. Not indifferent to the technique of Genka, trying to understand the device of the toy, breaks the airplane. Now he needs to fix it quickly, until Druzhok noticed nothing.

4.title: Episode #4.4
4.plot: Barboskiny - 48 series 12/13/2012 Lisa and Druzhk believe that it's unfair - when they ask Mom something, she refuses, but it's worthwhile for the Kid to build a nice face, as everyone brings it to him on a silver platter. What's the secret? In the child's charm of the Baby. Lisa and Druzhok decide to adopt the habits and mannerisms of the Baby. But when they begin to behave like very young children, Mama does not get the reaction she expected at all.

5.title: Episode #4.5
5.plot: Barboskiny - 49 series 12/13/2012 Genka conducts a biological experiment - he learned that if you communicate with plants, they blossom faster. The rest of the children are extremely concerned that Genka started talking to the cactus. They decide to help Genke get rid of the obsession and steal the plant, which so badly "affects" the brother.

6.title: Episode #4.6
6.plot: Barboskiny - 50 series 12/13/2012 The friend decides to teach the Baby to say "No!" When he is again asked for something - or else, everyone who is not lazy, enjoy good-natured, trouble-free Baby. The problem arises when the Druzhka needs urgent help, and the only one who can help is the Kid. Now Druzhka has to urgently retrain Baby back.

7.title: Episode #4.7
7.plot: Barboskiny - 51 series 12/18/2012 The friend of joy - from the sports camp his best friend Timo has returned. The best way to do this is to arrange a rally over Sister Rosa, "as in the good old days!" Timoch supports the idea of the Druzhka, but when he sees Rose, who has grown up during his absence, he suddenly falls in love with himself. Timocha no longer wants to arrange a rally for Rosa, but he can not offend the Druzhka either.

8.title: Episode #4.8
8.plot: Barboskiny - 52 series 12/18/2012 The friend plays Rosa and Lisa, suddenly frightening them. The sisters promised to take revenge and frighten him into revenge. The threat causes the Friend only laughter. But waiting for the execution of the threat is not an easy test.

9.title: Episode #4.9
9.plot: Barboskiny - 53 series 12/18/2012 Lisa decides to teach a lesson to Rosa, who is sure of it. That she is the first beauty. Lisa throws up her anonymous note, in which she declares that Rosa is not at all beautiful. But the effect is too strong - now Rosa is sure that she is the most terrible, to watch yourself is no longer worth it, and in general - life has lost all meaning. Now Lisa will have to dissuade Rosa back.

10.title: Episode #4.10
10.plot: Barboskiny - 54 series 12/18/2012 Dad decided to start repairs in the apartment, and children at the time of repair to send to his aunt with his uncle. Lisa - the only one who is delighted with this news, because she adores the oatmeal prepared by the aunt. The rest of the children decide to make a secret repair in one night, so that they do not have to go anywhere. The only problem is Lisa, who will stop at nothing for her favorite oatmeal.

11.title: Episode #4.11
11.plot: Barboskiny - 55 series 12/18/2012 The friend lost the ball, Lisa and Rosa advised him to post a notice about the loss and promise a reward. But after Druzhok has hung up the ads, the girls themselves find the ball. Now Lisa and Rosa have a dilemma - should they give their brother a ball just like this or do they demand a well-deserved reward?

12.title: Episode #4.12
12.plot: Barboskiny - 56 series 12/18/2012 Another prank Druzhka becomes the last straw - Lisa states that such an ill-bred brother should not come for her birthday. My friend is upset - I'll have to stay without a crimson cake - But Gena offers him a way out - to impersonate his own clone, which will be more educated and tidy. Such a "version" of the Druzhka should please Liza.

13.title: Episode #4.13
13.plot: Barboskiny - 57 SERIES 12/18/2012 The Kid accidentally reads a note in which Timoha wrote a poem dedicated to Rose. Timok asks the little one not to tell anyone about this - he declares that this is a military secret, about which no one should know. But the curious Rose, hearing that the boys have some secrets, tries with all the strength to find out from the Little Boy a "military secret" - What will happen next? You will find out after watching the series of the Barboskina cartoon - "Military Secret".

14.title: Episode #4.14
14.plot: Barboskiny - 58 SERIES 12/18/2012 The friend brings home a grasshopper. But Genka says that the insect can not be left at home - because Rosa is terribly afraid of grasshoppers. My friend assures me that she will not even know about him. But the grasshopper runs away and heads straight for the girls' room.

15.title: Episode #4.15
15.plot: Barboskiny - 59 series 12/18/2012 Rosa and Lisa are going to clean the potatoes for dinner. The appearance of Grandfather abruptly changes their plans - he declares that they can cook a whole dinner. And the best family dinner is salmagandi. An ancient pirate dish with an exotic way of cooking. In the process of cooking, Lisa and Rose understand that the preparations are so exotic that the family can generally stay without dinner. But how can I say this to my beloved Grandfather, inspired by the desire to cook his favorite dish?

1.title: Episode #5.1
1.plot: Barboskiny - 60 series 12/18/2012 The grandfather notices the sad Baby - the Friend did not take him to the backyard match, saying that the keeper from Malysh was useless. Grandfather comforts his grandson and assures that in the future he will necessarily become as famous a goalkeeper as his old acquaintance Lev Yasha. Once he saved the team's crystal cup by catching it in a three-meter jump. Inspired Kid decides to practice on his mother's favorite vase.

2.title: Episode #5.2
2.plot: Barboskiny - 61 series 12/18/2012 Gena is determined to establish contact with the Martians with a homemade radio installation. The problem is that for the contact he uses a television antenna, and Lisa and Rosa are determined to watch the evening show.

3.title: Episode #5.3
3.plot: Barboskiny - 62 series 12/18/2012 Children learn the terrible news - for the time of repair they will be sent to strict uncles and aunt. For a whole week. The only way out is to secretly make repairs on your own.

4.title: Episode #5.4
4.plot: Lisa has a horrible day on the horoscope. Lisa decides not to pay attention to stupid predictions, but the troubles begin to pour in one after another.

5.title: Episode #5.5
5.plot: Barboskiny - 64 series 12/18/2012 The druzhka overcomes curiosity - in their family there was a secret society. The most insulting thing is that all the children except him have become its members. He really wants to know the secret of the mysterious daily meetings. But the rest of the children resist - after all, if he learns their secret, society will cease to be a secret.

6.title: Episode #5.6
6.plot: Barboskiny - 65 series 12/18/2012 A friend shares with Timoha a genius idea - to become famous, they just need to come up with a new letter of the alphabet. But the realization of this stunning idea turns out to be much more difficult than friends had expected.

7.title: Episode #5.7
7.plot: Barboskiny - 66 series 12/18/2012 A friend borrowed a prefix from Timoha and broke it. He is sure that he can easily fix it with a hammer and chisel, but for now he needs to try not to get caught in Timothy's eyes.

8.title: Episode #5.8
8.plot: Barboskiny - 67 series 12/18/2012 Gena noticed that Lisa's squeal has a miraculous power - cactuses blossom from him. This unique natural phenomenon simply needs to be fixed on the camera. A friend is ready to help his brother shoot a scientific discovery and bring Lisa to scream by any methods.

9.title: Episode #5.9
9.plot: Barboskiny - 68 series 12/18/2012 Children learn that they will spend the weekend not at home in front of the TV, but on the least favorite dacha. Young conspirators decide to frustrate their parents' plans.

10.title: Episode #5.10
10.plot: Barboskiny - 69 series 12/18/2012 Gena does not want to help Lisa do the lessons. Then the enterprising sister offers him, in exchange for help, a training course in magic.

11.title: Episode #5.11
11.plot: Barboskiny - 70 series 12/18/2012 Lisa and Kid are playing policemen. But the trouble is that no one commits crimes at home, which means that there is absolutely no one to catch. Young policemen have to wriggle out, urgently coming up with new laws.

12.title: Episode #5.12
12.plot: Barboskiny - 71 series 12/18/2012 Druzh has many awards for winning in various competitions. The problem is that he always won from weaker rivals - the winners are not judged. But in the next competition he will have to fight with Timoha, who is stronger and faster than the Druzhka.

13.title: Episode #5.13
13.plot: Barboskiny - 72 series 12/18/2012 A friend does not care about his brothers and sisters at all, eating all the fruits that mom buys. The relatives decide to pity the Druzhka, showing him a heart-rending play about starving African crocodiles. Having penetrated, the Friend decides to get crocodiles at home.

14.title: Episode #5.14
14.plot: Barboskiny - 73 series 12/18/2012 Rose was invited to cast an ad. Lisa helps her sister to rehearse a role - but her methods cause Rosa to be perplexed - Does Lisa really want to help her or is she just jealous?

2.title: Episode #6.2
2.plot: Barboskiny - 76 series 12/18/2012 The decisive goal is not a reason for pride, says Gena. Another thing is the officially registered record. For example, the record for eating sweets. Ha, yes, sweets, then the boy is ready to eat as much as he likes. - Knew our heroes, debaters, who on the way they stood up.

3.title: Episode #6.3
3.plot: Barboskiny - 77 SERIES 12/18/2012 And what good is in these primitive computer games? But even an exemplary disciple of Gene can forget about studying, and about rest, and about siblings. Now it's more important for him to move on to the next level of the game. And relatives are not quite sure whether this strange type is exactly their brother Gene.

4.title: Episode #6.4
4.plot: Barboskiny - 78 series 12/18/2012 The grandfather postpones his planned trip to the sea. My friend, Rosa and Lisa understand that it's their fault - they begged the good grandfather all the pension for their trinkets. Where now to get money to fulfill the grandfather's dream?

5.title: Episode #6.5
5.plot: Barboskiny - 79 series 12/18/2012 Lisa thinks out that she has lost her new shoes, so that Rosa would let her reproach her. Rose, imbued with the "misfortune" of her sister, agrees. But the joy of Lisa is clouded by Druzhok, who is ready to help her find her loss. Now Lisa needs to prevent his brother from finding his shoes, which have never gone anywhere.

6.title: Episode #6.6
6.plot: Barboskiny - 80 series 12/18/2012 Gena made Lisa on the birthday fireworks. He is sure that Lisa will appreciate his creation - this is a high-tech salute, during which dozens of tremendous chemical reactions take place. It's a pity that only looks outwardly rather unattractively - A friend with Baby decides to hedge Genka and buy a more spectacular salute in the store.

7.title: Episode #6.7
7.plot: Barboskiny - 81 series 12/18/2012 To become great, you just need to wait a little - ten to twenty years, or better - thirty. But if the matter is urgent, there are other ways to grow up. The kid, however, misses some very important advantages of his age.

8.title: Episode #6.8
8.plot: Barboskiny - 82 series 12/18/2012 No one takes the kid seriously, everyone is busy with terribly adult affairs, to which he is not yet mature. And who would have thought that the little activity can be torn away from the most important affairs and distract the most-most interesting games?

9.title: Episode #6.9
9.plot: Barboskiny - 83 series 12/18/2012 To study practical magic by the o-o-textbook is not easy. With the disappearance of objects Lisa copes quickly, but to influence the behavior of the brother is much more difficult. But if you show perseverance - everything will turn out, albeit not immediately.

10.title: Episode #6.10
10.plot: Barboskiny - 84 series 12/18/2012 How to make the older brothers and sisters play with you? After all, they are always busy with their "adult" affairs. The kid finds a way out - it is enough to grab someone's thing and arrange funny catch-ups in the yard.

11.title: Episode #6.11
11.plot: Barboskiny - 85 series 12/18/2012 Gena prepare for an important olympiad, the main prize of which will be a grant for training in a foreign school. But the rest of the children, instead of supporting his brother, only get in the way. Genka takes offense at the brothers and sisters until he finds out that they just do not want him to leave.

12.title: Episode #6.12
12.plot: Barboskiny - 86 series 12/18/2012 Well, Gena is also indignant: in the age of technological progress and the triumph of science, the Kid sincerely believes in the existence of a house-spirit from a fairy tale. However, inexplicable events begin to occur in the house. And what is most surprising is that without these events life becomes a little more boring.

13.title: Episode #6.13
13.plot: Barboskiny - 87 series 12/18/2012 Rosa, it seems, does not notice how the neighbor of Timok looks at her enthusiastically. To Rosa drew attention to him, you need to pretend that he cares for - Lisa. Lisa is so involved in the role that the result is unexpected for all participants in the triangle.

14.title: Episode #6.14
14.plot: Barboskiny - 88 series 12/18/2012 Do not see Rosa's favorite show, and even at night, do not beat Lisa with one mother's thing. In the heart of Lisa, this storm: not only is she indulging the delirious infatuation of her sister, so also the characters of the series can not figure out their relationship - But you want to know what happened there.

15.title: Episode #6.15
15.plot: Barboskiny - 89 series 12/18/2012 Who decorates the yard with flowers? This is not the original design solution. And Gena enters into a creative dispute with Rosa. Does it really happen that both disputants are right?

1.title: Episode #7.1
1.plot: Barboskiny - 90 series 12/18/2012 Oh, it was good in old times. Wearing armor - and already a hero - The friend did so: put on shiny armor. Now, if he plays, it is very heroic, but he acts resolutely and irrevocably. However, this heroic deed has yet to be accomplished.

2.title: Episode #7.2
2.plot: Barboskiny - 91 series 12/18/2012 It would be nice to stay at home alone and do whatever you want. And nothing should and does not owe anyone. Beauty. Desire Druzhka unexpectedly performed, but for some reason he is not happy about it.

3.title: Episode #7.3
3.plot: Barboskiny - 92 series 12/18/2012 Today for dinner - pizza, and cook her - Lisa. It's almost a disaster, consider Rosa, Druzhok and Gena, because Lisa is an inexperienced culinary expert. The guys are going to help Lisa. But that the sister does not take offense, she should not know about it.
